title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: In the properties file, when a key is left blank but has a valid value, the text cannot be externalized in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be successfully displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Leave the key blank but provide a valid value.
3. Check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title.
